name: Nero
title: The Dreamsmith
description: A miraculous survivor of a brutal freeze, who gained the power to shape dreams. In the waking world he acts solitarily and stays untraceable; in his dream-space he is all-powerful.

effects: Disables placement of Gloo Walls within the dream field
Deals continuous damage to enemies inside the zone
Marks the enemy for a short duration if they destroy the plush

strengths: Breaks enemy defense by disabling Gloo Walls
weaknesses: Using ability may expose Nero in some situations

best_combinations.reason: Boosts fire rate, headshot damage, and reduces enemy healing.
Provides damage reduction, long-range advantage, and enemy tracking.
Balanced between offense, defense and cooldown support.

name: Rin
title: Yagami Ninja
description: Trained in ancient sword- and kunai-techniques, the younger sister of the Yagami family heir. Calm, skilled and built to disrupt enemy cover and defenses.

special_effects: Automatically summons kunai every 8 seconds (up to 3 stacked)
Kunai auto-target enemies or Gloo Walls when user hits target
Highly effective at breaking Gloo Wall defenses

strengths: Excellent at breaking Gloo Wall defenses
Automatic damage without needing to aim kunai manually
Strong in mid-range skirmishes and aggressive play
weaknesses: Effect is not as strong in very close-quarters without cover to break
Dependent on the action of hitting a target to trigger kunai
Best when combined with aggressive teammates

best_combinations.reason: Increases movement speed and sustain so Rin can flank and trigger kunai frequently.
Reduces recoil/fall-damage & boosts accuracy—good for aggressive mid-range plays.

name: Oscar
title: Night Vigilante
description: By day a brilliant student, by night a vigilante leaping through the shadows. Tactical, precise and built to break through fortified enemy positions.

effects: Destroys up to the first 3 Gloo Walls encountered
Deals damage to and knocks back enemies in the dash path

strengths: Breaks through enemy cover and defensive setups
Initiates fights and creates openings for team
Surprises enemies relying on Gloo Wall defenses
weaknesses: Requires good timing and positioning to be effective
Dash can be predicted or countered if enemies anticipate it

best_combinations.reason: Provides enemy tagging & vision, plus mobility/heal support for Oscar’s initiations.
Increases Oscar’s survivability while he pushes into defensive enemy setups.

name: Kassie
title: The Mindlink Summoner
description: Kassie is a prodigy psychologist whose experimental AM-Tracking Mindlink can synchronize senses with allies, detecting hidden threats and revealing enemies through barriers.

effects: Reveals nearby enemies within the scan radius
Shares enemy visibility with one synced ally
Marks enemies briefly after they leave the scan zone

strengths: Excellent enemy scanning and wall-vision support

best_combinations.reason: Enhances tag duration, accuracy, and fire-rate synergy.
Improves mobility and gun handling around scanned enemies.
Maximum intel support with backup healing synergy.

name: Kairos
title: The Elite Assault Operator
description: Kairos is a former special forces soldier equipped with a kinetic energy suit that amplifies his combat potential. When activated, his suit generates recovery energy that restores EP rapidly in battle.
strengths: Strong in close- to mid-range duels
weaknesses: Passive is slow for burst fights
Relies on EP for full value

best_combinations.reason: Maximizes mobility and EP conversion for aggressive combat.
Boosts armor penetration, durability, and enemy tracking.
High sustain healing and durability stacking.

name: Ryden
title: The Spider Tech Prodigy
description: Ryden is a 16-year-old genius inventor who created an autonomous spider bot capable of tracking and slowing enemies. His inventions help control fights by disrupting enemy mobility.

effects: Releases a spider bot that attaches to an enemy
Forces enemies to reposition or disengage

weaknesses: Cooldown is long for team fights

best_combinations.reason: Improves mobility, tagging, and quick eliminations.
Maximizes strafing and movement while enemies are slowed.
Boosts long-range elimination potential on slowed targets.

name: Ignis
title: The Flame Wielder
description: Ignis is a resilient fighter who manipulates energy into burning walls of flame. His fiery barrier punishes enemies that try to rush or cross his line of defense.

effects: Creates a flaming wall that blocks damage
Burns enemies crossing the flame line

strengths: Good for holding angles and defending
weaknesses: Not useful in open fights with no cover
Enemies can rotate around the wall

best_combinations.reason: Gives damage reduction, armor penetration, and enemy marking.
Boosts mobility, DPS, and anti-shield efficiency.
Maximizes sustain when enemies push through flames.

name: Suzy
title: The Bounty Huntress
description: Suzy is a fearless street enforcer who collects bounties from defeated enemies. Her skill grants extra eco-strength by rewarding players for aggressive eliminations.

effects: Earns bonus coins for each knocked enemy
Supports faster weapon and utility purchases

strengths: Best passive for gaining fast economy
Major advantage in early and mid-game loadouts
weaknesses: Useless if you can't secure kills
Economy cap can be reached quickly in some matches

best_combinations.reason: Boosts speed, accuracy, and fire rate — perfect for aggressive fights.
Marks enemies, increases damage scaling, and boosts penetration.
Strong healing + mobility ensures Suzy stays alive to farm coins.

name: Sonia
title: The Nano Guardian
description: Sonia is a biotechnology researcher with a nano-shield system that temporarily saves her from fatal blows. She can continue fighting in a limited survivable state before collapsing.

effects: Activates a nano-shield preventing instant death
Allows Sonia to fight for a few seconds after lethal damage
Can eliminate enemies during survival state
If she kills someone, she revives with HP restored

strengths: Best clutch ability in tight fights
Allows second chance even after lethal damage
weaknesses: Movement speed reduced during survival state
Requires securing a kill to revive

best_combinations.reason: Maximizes the chance to secure kills during her survival window.
Boosts accuracy, mobility, and tagging to clutch enemies.
Increases strafing, fire rate, and finishing potential.

name: Orion
title: The Shadow Predator
description: Orion is a mysterious warrior infused with shadow energy. He can temporarily transform his body into a void-like form, making him immune to damage while absorbing enemy HP.

effects: Transforms Orion into a shadow form immune to damage
Allows safe repositioning or clutch engagements

strengths: Effective for pushing squads or escaping fights
weaknesses: Requires close distance to absorb HP
Cannot deal normal weapon damage during ability

best_combinations.reason: Enhances rushing capability, penetration, and sustain.
Provides speed, accuracy, and enemy tracking.
Improves strafing, fire rate, and survivability.

name: Santino
title: The Fashion Phantom
description: Santino is a charismatic fashion icon with the ability to summon a digital mannequin that mimics his movements. This phantom can be positioned for strategic teleportation.

effects: Allows instant teleportation to the mannequin
Useful for repositioning, flanking, or escaping

weaknesses: Not ideal for straight combat buffs

best_combinations.reason: Boosts mobility and provides enemy tracking.
Maximizes strafing and accuracy during repositioning.
Adds tankiness and survivability after teleport plays.

name: Luna
title: The Moon Blade Specialist
description: Luna is a trained lunar assassin whose abilities manipulate tempo and rhythm of battle. Her passive increases firing-rate efficiency with every bullet landed.

effects: Increases fire rate after dealing damage
Stacks quickly with SMGs and ARs

strengths: Great for close to mid-range duels
weaknesses: Requires consistent gunshots to keep stacks

best_combinations.reason: Maximizes fire rate, headshot multipliers, and speed.
Enhances tracking, accuracy, and damage penetration.
Improves recoil control, strafing, and sustain in fights.

name: Tatsuya
title: The Street Sprinter
description: Tatsuya is a rebellious street racer with incredible dash bursts that let him close distances or escape instantly.

effects: Great for entry fragging and surprise rushes

strengths: Best rush mobility in Free Fire

best_combinations.reason: Boosts sprint speed, accuracy, and healing on kills.
Increases penetration, tracking, and fire rate.
Improves combat mobility and scaling.

name: A-Patroa
title: The Rhythm Commander
description: A-Patroa is a powerful performer whose presence energizes allies. Her energy field boosts movement and reload speed, enabling hyper-aggressive plays.

best_combinations.reason: Maximizes team mobility and DPS output.
Gives frontline durability and sustain.
Improves damage scaling and enemy marking.

name: Iris
title: The Defense Breaker
description: Iris is a young hacker who deploys EMP rounds that temporarily weaken enemy gloo walls while marking targets behind them.

effects: EMPs enemy gloo walls dealing bonus damage to them
Marks enemies hiding behind gloo walls

best_combinations.reason: Enhances speed, enemy tracking, and fire rate for rushes.
Increases DPS, accuracy, and damage penetration.
Provides survivability when pushing broken gloo walls.

name: J.Biebs
title: The Silent Sentinel
description: Inspired by Justin Bieber, J.Biebs uses his EP connection to protect himself and nearby allies, converting their energy into a defensive shield.

effects: Allies within range can block damage using their EP
EP used by allies is transferred back to J.Biebs

strengths: Protects both self and teammates via EP shield
Useful in team fights and defensive plays
weaknesses: Only works within a small radius
No direct damage or mobility boost

best_combinations.reason: Alok and A124 generate EP, Nairi provides defensive cover — all useful for J.Biebs’ shield.
EP-centric team, helps maintain EP for damage blocking.

name: Homer
title: The Blind Assassin
description: Despite being blind from birth, Homer is a deadly assassin who uses a shockwave drone to disorient and damage his foes.

effects: Sends a drone that explodes on the nearest enemy
Reduces enemy movement and firing speed
Deals damage over the pulse area

strengths: Great at disrupting enemy mobility and firepower
Can be used to initiate or defend
Effective in both solo and team fights
weaknesses: Requires good timing to maximize impact
Skill effect is centered on a small area

best_combinations.reason: Tags enemies, brings mobility, and helps with aggressive plays while Homer slows them.
Sustain + firepower to exploit slowed enemies.

name: Kenta
title: The Shield Swordsman
description: Kenta is a frontline shield guardian. He can generate a frontal protective barrier that takes the brunt of enemy fire, shielding teammates behind him.

effects: Generates a frontal shield that reduces incoming weapon damage
Shield effect weakens when Kenta fires his weapon

strengths: Very useful in tight firefights / narrow engagements
weaknesses: Less effective in ranged fights or when flanked

best_combinations.reason: Healing + sustain + penetration support to make a strong frontline.
Mobile team that can capitalize on protection and aggressive plays.

name: Nairi
title: The Storm Chaser
description: A climate-tech researcher who strengthens his Gloo Walls with self-healing durability, making them more resilient and useful as defensive cover.

effects: Restores durability of deployed Gloo Walls over time
Increases damage to Gloo Walls when using assault rifles

strengths: Great for defensive or turtle strategies
weaknesses: Less useful in very aggressive or fast-paced fights without usage of walls

best_combinations.reason: Mobility + sustain + frontline protection to use her walls effectively.
Healing + long-range damage + durability to create strong defended pushes.

name: Otho
title: The Memory Engineer
description: A tech genius who uses memory projection to reveal nearby enemies after a kill, giving his squad crucial intel during fights.

effects: After knocking down / killing an enemy, reveals other nearby enemy locations

strengths: Helps in planning next moves or catching rotated enemies
Useful in both squad and solo play
weaknesses: Trigger condition depends on a kill
Passive only — no direct combat or defensive boost
Less useful in very passive or late-game fights

best_combinations.reason: Enemy tagging + damage + sustain to use the information well.
Mobility + durability to capitalize post-reveal.

name: Leon
title: The Comeback Star
description: A rising basketball star who recovers health after surviving a fight, making him a resilient duelist who can stay in the fight longer.

effects: Recovers HP after a combat encounter

strengths: Good for aggressive but risky plays
weaknesses: Requires surviving a fight to trigger

best_combinations.reason: Mobility + finish power + healing to extend fights.
Sustain + shield + aggressive playstyle.

name: Koda
title: The Cyber Guardian
description: Koda is a futuristic cyber-warrior who boosts reload and swap times, making gunfights faster and more efficient.
strengths: Strong synergy with SMGs and ARs

name: Thiva
title: The Rhythm Medic
description: Thiva is a musician who specializes in saving teammates faster and providing bonus HP after successful rescues.
strengths: Fastest revive character in Free Fire

name: Dimitri
title: The Healing DJ
description: Dimitri creates a healing zone where teammates recover HP and can self-revive.
strengths: Best self-revive skill in the game

name: D-Bee
title: The Hype Shooter
description: D-Bee increases accuracy and movement speed when firing while moving.

name: Maro
title: The Falcon Marksman
description: Maro deals extra damage based on distance and marks targets for increased damage.

name: Skyler
title: The Sonic CEO
description: Skyler unleashes a sonic wave that destroys Gloo Walls and heals him based on the number destroyed.

effects: Destroys Gloo Walls in a straight line
Heals Skyler when destroying Gloo Walls

name: Xayne
title: The Extreme Athlete
description: Xayne is an adrenaline junkie who enters an enhanced combat state, boosting her HP temporarily and dealing increased damage to Gloo Walls and shields.

name: Shirou
title: The Delivery Guardian
description: Shirou marks enemies who damage him and deals additional armor-penetrating damage on his next shot.

effects: Marks attacker for a few seconds
Next hit deals heavy armor penetration

strengths: High damage burst when returning fire

name: Chrono
title: The Time Warrior
description: Chrono creates a powerful force field that blocks incoming damage and boosts movement speed inside it.

effects: Used to take cover instantly during fights

name: Dasha
title: The Party Girl
description: Dasha reduces recoil, weapon shake, and fall damage, making her useful for chaotic gunfights.
strengths: Great for AR and LMG spray control

name: K
title: Captain Booyah
description: K has two EP-based modes—one boosts EP conversion and the other gradually restores EP to himself and teammates.

effects: Massive EP conversion increase for allies

strengths: Best EP sustain in the game

name: Luqueta
title: The Rising Star
description: Luqueta gains max HP after each kill, allowing him to become tankier as the match progresses.

name: Kelly
title: The Sprinter
description: Kelly increases sprinting speed and, after awakening, deals extra damage on the first shot.

name: Hayato
title: The Samurai
description: Hayato increases armor penetration as his HP drops, becoming deadlier under pressure.

effects: More armor penetration at lower HP

strengths: High kill potential in low HP situations

name: Moco
title: The Hacker
description: Moco tags enemies she hits, revealing their location for her team for several seconds.

effects: Reveals enemy location after hitting them
Awakened version shares tracking with teammates

strengths: Best tracking character in the game

name: Steffie
title: The Explosive Genius
description: Steffie reduces damage from explosives and throws grenades further, making her a defensive yet aggressive combatant.

effects: Increases throw distance of grenades and molotovs

name: Misha
title: The Energy Guru
description: Misha can convert EP into HP for herself and teammates, providing healing support in fights.

name: Maxim
title: The Arms Specialist
description: Maxim gains HP when looting, making him more survivable in late-game loot runs.

effects: Gains HP when picking up items

strengths: Good for survival in open areas

name: Andrew
title: The Armor Master
description: Andrew reduces vest durability loss, making him more tanky and effective in prolonged fights.

name: Lila
title: The Energy Savior
description: Lila can restore EP of herself and teammates faster, enhancing survivability in fights.

name: Caroline
title: The Rebel Queen
description: Caroline gains increased accuracy and fire rate while aiming down sights, making her deadly in mid-range firefights.

name: Laura
title: The Sniper Master
description: Laura increases accuracy while using scoped weapons, making her lethal at long range.

effects: Improves precision with sniper and scoped weapons

name: Rafael
title: The Firefighter
description: Rafael can throw incendiary grenades farther and takes reduced fire and explosion damage.

effects: Reduces incoming fire and explosion damage

name: Alok
title: The DJ of Healing
description: Alok creates an aura that heals HP and increases movement speed for nearby allies.

name: Jota
title: The Survivor
description: Jota regenerates HP when eliminating enemies with SMGs or shotguns, making him a strong rusher.

effects: Works with SMG and Shotgun kills

name: Clu
title: The Tracker
description: Clu detects nearby enemies within a certain range and shares this info with teammates.

effects: Reveals nearby enemies to self and teammates
Helps plan ambushes or avoid danger

name: Wolfrahh
title: The Headshot King
description: Wolfrahh deals increased headshot damage, scaling up with distance, making him lethal at mid-long range.

name: Jai
title: The Scout
description: Jai has increased movement speed and jump height when outside safe zone, improving mobility for rotations.

effects: Higher jumps for mobility and escape

name: Alvaro
title: The Bomber
description: Alvaro reduces grenade damage received and throws grenades farther, making him both offensive and resilient.

name: Antonio
title: The Brawler
description: Antonio gains extra HP at the start of the game, making him tankier in the early phase.
weaknesses: Does not scale with late-game fights

name: Paloma
title: The Arms Dealer
description: Paloma starts with extra ammo for all weapons, giving her an advantage in early-game fights.

effects: Extra ammo for all guns at start

name: Miguel
title: The Berserker
description: Miguel gains HP every time he kills an enemy, enhancing survivability in extended fights.

name: Nikita
title: The Gunslinger
description: Nikita reloads SMGs faster, allowing her to maintain high DPS in close-range fights.
weaknesses: Less effective with other weapon types

name: Kapella
title: The Healer
description: Kapella increases the healing received from medkits and other healing items, making her vital in team fights.

effects: Increases healing from medkits, bandages, and other consumables
Supports long fights and team survivability

strengths: Boosts HP recovery for herself and teammates

name: Joseph
title: The Mechanic
description: Joseph takes reduced damage when vaulting over obstacles and throws, giving him mobility and tankiness in urban fights.

effects: Reduces damage while vaulting or jumping over obstacles
Improves survivability in close-range urban combat

name: Notora
title: The Sniper Specialist
description: Notora increases weapon accuracy when using sniper rifles and DMRs after standing still for a short time.

effects: Reward players who hold position for precise shots

name: A124
title: The Android
description: A124 can heal herself automatically after taking damage when HP is low, and shields nearby allies temporarily.

effects: Automatically heals herself when low HP

weaknesses: Ability triggers only under low HP

name: Kla
title: The Muay Thai Fighter
description: Kla deals extra punch damage and increases movement speed after a kill, excelling in close-range fights.

effects: Temporary movement boost after eliminating an enemy

weaknesses: Dependent on kills to activate speed boost

name: Wukong
title: The Trickster
description: Wukong can camouflage as a bush, giving him stealth and the ability to ambush unsuspecting enemies.

effects: Transforms into a bush to hide from enemies
Ideal for ambush or escape tactics

name: Olivia
title: The Strategist
description: Olivia can heal teammates faster and revive them with extra HP, enhancing team survivability.

name: Ford
title: The Defense Expert
description: Ford gains reduced damage when inside the safe zone, improving survivability for long fights.

effects: Reduces incoming damage inside safe zone

name: Shani
title: The Armor Specialist
description: Shani repairs armor when damaged, maintaining survivability in long battles.
